name: add-nameservers
description:
User should be able to set up additional nameservers.

TODO : test case to be confirmed
pre_condition:
- User is connected to the wired or to a Wifi service
- ConnMan UI is opened 
- Remotely connect to the target device via ssh, with a working station
- Execute the following command on the  working station : 'watch -n 1 "cat /var/lib/connman/*/settings"

steps.description: Double click on the connected service
steps.expected: A window appears with an advance menu
Nameservers features are displayed on the right side of the window

steps.description: Add a DNS server in the form, for example 8.8.8.8 and click on 'Save'
steps.expected: A window appears with the message 'Nameservers saved successfully'. Nameservers field displays the additional nameserver on the working station

author: zingile
